maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/1/settin.orig: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/1/settin.text: Дверь заперта, верно? Кажется, мы в ловушке.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
Let me tell you a little trick 
about conversations.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Позволь мне рассказать тебе 
небольшую хитрость насчёт разговоров.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
People... they like to 
share their stories.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Люди... они любят 
делиться своими историями.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
So if you want to be on their 
good side...\. listen to them.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Так что, если ты хочешь 
с ними поладить... \. слушай их.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
Add a few comments, ask questions...
let them know you are interested.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Добавь несколько замечаний, задавай вопросы...
дай им понять, что ты заинтересована.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
Keep the conversation flowing naturally, 
but let them do the talking.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Поддерживай разговор естественно,
но позволь им говорить.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
That's how people
enjoy your company.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Так людям будет приятно 
с тобой в компании.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
However...\. none of this works, 
if the other person can't talk.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Однако...\. ничего из этого не работает, 
если другой человек не может разговаривать.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
I found that out the hard way... 
when I met her.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Я познал это на себе... 
когда встретил её.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
She could only listen, 
very much like you.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Она могла только слушать, 
прямо как ты.

maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.orig:
So for once...\.
I had to do the talking.
maps/dreams/tenth.json/entities/27/setti.text:
Этот тот редкий случай...\. 
Когда мне пришлось говорить.
